ingredients.ingredient: 1 (8 ounce) package queso asadero (white Mexican cheese), cut into 3/4-inch thick strips

cookingTips: Roast chile peppers over open flame until blackened, then steam in plastic bag to loosen skin
Make meringue by beating egg whites until stiff peaks form for fluffy coating
Fry chiles carefully at 375°F for golden exterior while keeping filling warm
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the user through making authentic chile rellenos with proper roasting and batter technique. Emphasize the importance of properly charring and peeling peppers and creating a light, airy egg white batter.
